entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
